content.text: Match ends, Watford 1, Swansea City 0.

Dangerous play by Eder (Swansea City).
Ikechi Anya (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Federico Fernández (Swansea City) header from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jefferson Montero with a cross.
